name: Extra Custom Product Tabs for WooCommerce
author: Codevyne Creatives

sections.description:
**Custom Produuct Tabs Woocommerce plugin ** using this plugin you can extends WooCommerce to allow shop owners to add custom multiple tabs to single product. All tabs will display on the individual product pages to the right of the default “Description” tab.

**Extra product tabs ** are managed on the single Edit Product screen and can be added on a per product basis. You can also enable / disable the tabs, create or Edit or saved or remove the tabs and add them to multiple products as needed.

ðŸ‘‰**Plugin Features**

  • Option to Enable/Disable product tabs
  • Create or Add multiple product tabs
  • Remove product tabs anytime
  • Custom product tab content displayed on the front end

If you want more information about this plugin or another one donâ€™t doubt to visit our website: https://www.codevyne.com/

TECHNICAL SUPPORT

If any problem occurs, please contact us at work@codevyne.com

How to Add Extra Custom Product Tabs for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Upload the directory /custom-product-tabs-for-woocommerce/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click on “WC Extra Tabs” menu under product data on edit product page

short_description: Add extra multiple custom tabs with tab name and content in single product using WooCommerce.
